Smoked Brisket

grilled
beef

Ingredients

  • Brisket

Procedure

  1. Trim fat to 1/4" all over, try to avoid leaving divots in the fat cap
  2. Set up a snake in the grill (if using wood chunks, place at head of the snake)
  3. Maintain grill at about 250
  4. Grill until brisket reaches 160 internal temp (2.5 -> 3 hours depending on size)
  5. Wrap with 2 layers of foil (optionally top with tallow or butter)
  6. Grill until probe tender (about 200 internal temp) -> check temp roughly every hour
  7. let brisket cool before slicing
